name: Hide Google Plus G+ Headers & other improvements
description: The origin of this style was to merely hide the larger header images. After a terrible UI update to G+ in late 2015, which Computerworld described as Google murdering G+, I decided to make various overall refinements to the G+ site. Header images continue to be hidden. Perhaps overly extreme the collections and various other header stuff is now hidden (start a discussion if it's too much). Other changes are: 1. Shrunken header search-bar (it's thinner). 2. Improved side-bar menu. 3. Tweaked border and shadow on posts. 4. Left panel within each collection is neater. 5. Large new-post input-box area.
